particleLexeme: 1. Used at the beginning or end of a signed sentence or next to a verb (action) sign to mean from a given time forward into the future. English = from this time on, henceforth.
verbLexeme: 1. To move in the direction that is in front of you. English = go forward, advance.
2. To change for the better over a period of time. English = advance, develop.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: a surface moving forward.
